props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by `asChild`.

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our [Composition](https://akar.vinicunca.dev/core/guides/composition) guide for more details.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When `true`, prevents the user from interacting with the tab.

props.name: value
props.description: A unique value that associates the trigger with a content.
